component.name: zadd
component.description: add one or more members to a sorted set or update its score if it already exist

component.name: zCount
component.description: count the members in a sorted set with scores within the given values

component.name: zIncrBy
component.description: increment the score of a member in a sorted set

component.name: zInterStore
component.description: intersect multiple sorted sets and store the resulting stored set in a new key

component.name: zRange
component.description: return a range of members in a sorted set by index

component.name: zRangeByScore
component.description: return a range of members in a sorted set by score with scores ordered from high to low

component.name: zRank
component.description: determine the index of a member in a sorted set

component.name: zRem
component.description: remove one or more members from a sorted set

component.name: zRemRangeByRank
component.description: remove all members in a sorted set within the given indexes

component.name: zRemRangeByScore
component.description: remove all members in a sorted set within the given scores

component.name: zRevRange
component.description: return a range of members in a sorted set by index with scores ordered from high to low

component.name: zRevRangeByScore
component.description: return a range of members in a sorted set by score with score ordered form high to low

component.name: zRevRank
component.description: determine the index of a member in a sorted set with scores ordered from high to low

component.name: zScore
component.description: get the score associated with the given member in a sorted set

component.name: zUnionStore
component.description: add multiple stored sets and store the resulting stored set in a new key
